name: Drive3 Distortion
details:
Analog distortionLush analog distortion with 3 modes for finding the perfect sound.
Akai Professional's Analog Custom Shop Tri-Mode Distortion Guitar Effects Pedal is an excellent alternative to the more costly Deluxe Distortion. Tri-Mod Distortion combines Level, Tone and Distortion knobs with a Fat, Boost and Warm Tri-Mode switch in heavy-duty polished stainless-steel housing. True-bypass switching, three adjustable knobs and tone toggle switch provide precision tone control. 
Tri-Mode Distortion's Tri-Mode toggle-switch gives guitarists detailed gain control ranging from a speck of dust to a thick, dirty tornado of sound. Select Fat, Boost or Warm to enable soaring leads, lush chords and satisfying rhythm tones. Tone may be further adjusted using the three precision Level, Tone and Distortion knobs. 
Tri-Mode Distortion is powered by the included 9-volt battery or 9v AC adapter (sold separately). 
As with previous Akai Professional guitar pedals like the E2 Headrush and SB1 Deep Impact Bass Synth, the Analog Custom Shop line is a collection of pedal effects designed to exacting standards, using the highest quality components. Analog Custom Shop pedals provide rich tone, texture and character to immediately enhance and inspire players of any musical style.
FEATURES
Triple-throw switch for Fat, Boost and Warm
Pure analog with top quality components
Large vintage style knobs for easy setting and viewing
Level, Distortion and Tone controls.
True Bypass for retaining a pure signal when the effect is disengaged
